verbose_text: In presence of inducing concentrations of Hg 2+, MerR activates transcription of the functional genes in mer operon, thereby activating merA converting Hg 2+ to Hg 0, which in turn helps the bacteria to grow efficiently in high concentrations of mercury [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: MerR activates transcription of the functional genes in mer operon, thereby activating merA converting Hg
